'The Access Group' is a software consultancy and developer, selling primarily to
UK mid-market businesses. Headquartered in Stratford St Mary, near
Colchester, Essex, it has nine other offices across the UK: Harpenden,
Sheffield, Canterbury, London City, Edinburgh, Canterbury, Newcastle, Manchester
and Dublin. The organisation was formed in June 2009 following the absorption of
five companies - Access Accounting, Armstrong Consultants, Access Accounting
Ireland, Asyst Solutions and Access Supply Chain â into a single operation. In
March 2011, Access was acquired by its management team and investment company
Lyceum Capital Partners LLP in a deal worth Â£50m.
categories: Software companies of the United Kingdom
